result.name: energy-performance-of-buildings-data-england-and-wales
result.notes:
This dataset contains information from Energy Performance Certificates and Display Energy Certificates for buildings in England and Wales

The requirement for energy certificates for buildings flows from the EU Directive on the energy performance of buildings. The principle underlying the requirements of the EU Directive on the energy performance of buildings is to make the energy efficiency of buildings transparent through the provision of energy certificates and to show how the energy efficiency of the building can be improved.

organization.name: department-for-communities-and-local-government
organization.title: Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government
organization.description:
The Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government's (formerly the Department for Communities and Local Government) job is to create great places to live and work, and to give more power to local people to shape what happens in their area.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ministry-of-housing-communities-and-local-government

result.title: Energy Performance of Buildings Data England and Wales

extras.value: ["To access the data an individual has to sign up. The data available contains personal information covered by the Data Protection Act 1998, as well as data under a restrictive licence. DCLG is required to confirm that users have understood and agreed to these, as well as collecting the details of those who have requested access. The data is available to software developers via an API."]

The data available contains personal information covered by the Data Protection Act 1998, as well as data under a restrictive licence. Due to third-party intellectual property rights, address level data is published under a copyright notice which defines the purposes for which the data can be used. Read guidance notes for full details.
